channel.title: jcenter on Crushing C.O.D.E
channel.description: Recent content in jcenter on Crushing C.O.D.E

item.title: Guide to publishing your Android Library via Jcenter/Bintray
item.author: nisrulz@gmail.com (Nishant Srivastava)
item.description: Developers are a different kind of people altogether. They tend to be lazy but strive to be super efficient at the same time. A lot of this can be seen in the Android world where a certain library pops up everyday to solve a specific problem or to make the complex processes simpler.
